SELECT B.CASE_CODE AS CODE, CASE WHEN LEN(StuList)=0 THEN '' ELSE LEFT(StuList,LEN(StuList)-1) END NAME FROM (SELECT CASE_CODE, (SELECT real_name+'/' FROM (SELECT c.CASE_CODE,u.real_name FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c inner join sctrans.sys_user u on c.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = u.id UNION SELECT p.CASE_CODE,u.real_name FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR p inner join sctrans.sys_user u on p.PROCESSOR_ID = u.id) d WHERE d.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE FOR XML PATH('')) AS StuList FROM ( SELECT CASE_CODE,u.real_name FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c inner join sctrans.sys_user u on c.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = u.id UNION SELECT CASE_CODE,u.real_name FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR p inner join sctrans.sys_user u on p.PROCESSOR_ID = u.id ) A
WHERE
A.CASE_CODE = #{item.CASE_CODE}
GROUP BY A.CASE_CODE ) B
